snippet: The wife of Mets catcher John Buck is ready to deliver the couple’s third child, giving Travis d’Arnaud a chance to move to the majors.
abstract: New York Mets top catching prospect Travis d'Arnaud will move up to the majors to fill in for John Buck when his third child is born.
lead_paragraph: The wife of Mets catcher John Buck is ready to deliver the couple’s third child, giving Travis d’Arnaud a chance to move to the majors.

headline.main: Top Catching Prospect Is Poised to Join Mets
headline.print_headline: Top Catching Prospect Is Poised to Join Mets
